content:
# The error indicates that there is no coal available in my inventory to insert into the furnace, despite previously showing 5 units of coal. 
# This suggests that the coal may not have been properly inserted into the furnace after all.

# Step 31: I will first check my current inventory to confirm the available resources.
print(f"Current Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Output my current inventory details to verify coal availability.
